errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7+ instead of Python 3.8+ which creates version compatibility issues
correction_candidates: PyLabRobot is built on modern Python 3.8+ features and async/await syntax.
PyLabRobot is built on modern Python 3.6+ features and async/await syntax.
PyLabRobot is built on modern Python 3.10+ features and async/await syntax.
PyLabRobot is built on modern Python 3.7+ features and async/await syntax.
errors.golden_answer: PyLabRobot is built on modern Python 3.8+ features and async/await syntax.
